parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> When used on a person,a smooth transition to the given move will be initiated, but all previous playMove are discarded. <br>
The difference between [[playMove]] and [[playMoveNow]] is that [[playMove]] adds another move to the move queue, while [[playMoveNow]] replaces the whole move queue with new move (see [[#Examples|Example 2]]).
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> see [[:Category:Moves]] for respective games animations.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> soldier [[playMoveNow]] moveName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soldier: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> moveName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[playMoveNow]] "AmovPercMevaSlowWrflDf"</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[switchMove]] "AmovPercMstpSrasWrflDnon"; 
[] [[spawn]] 
{
	[[sleep]] 0.5; 
	[[player]] [[playMove]] "AmovPpneMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player goes prone</value></part></template>
	[[player]] [[playMove]] "amovPknlMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player gets up on one knee</value></part></template>
};</code>
<code>[[player]] [[switchMove]] "amovpercmstpsraswrfldnon";
[] [[spawn]]
{
	[[sleep]] 0.5; 
	[[player]] [[playMove]] "AmovPpneMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player never goes prone</value></part></template>
	[[player]] [[playMoveNow]] "AmovPknlMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player goes down on one knee straight away</value></part></template>
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[playMove]], [[switchMove]], [[playAction]], [[playActionNow]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
